description.value: People have noticed the originality and quality of your artistic creations, and you've started moonlighting as a professional artist. You become trained in Crafting or a Lore skill related to art (such as Art Lore or Sculpture Lore). When you succeed or critically succeed on a check to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Earn Income] using Crafting or a Lore skill related to art, calculate the amount you earn as if you'd attempted a check one level higher.
